description: Explore the differences between Arbitrum One and Arbitrum Nova, two Layer 2 solutions by Offchain Labs designed to enhance Ethereum's scalability. This analysis highlights their unique features, targeted audiences, and comparative benefits to guide developers in choosing the right solution for their needs.
keywords: Arbitrum One, Arbitrum Nova, blockchain, Layer 2 solutions, Ethereum scalability, optimistic rollups, EVM compatibility, blockchain ecosystem, Offchain Labs
title: Arbitrum One vs Arbitrum Nova: A Comparative Analysis
